gc01.cw.robf.controller

Class ManageOrdersViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gc01.cw.robf.controller.ManageOrdersViewController

  • public class ManageOrdersViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the Manage Orders interface. Allows all users to change order Status (in tableView) and permits managers to delete orders (selected tableView item), import orders from an XML file and export order to an XML file. Includes filter on tableView for search. Uses FXML template.

    TableView and editing adapted from http://docs.oracle.com/javafx/2/ui_controls/table-view.htm

    TableView filtering and sorting adapted from http://code.makery.ch/blog/javafx-8-tableview-sorting-filtering/

    TableView format override adapted from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11412360/javafx-table-cell-formatting

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rob Farthing

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Save button. If items have been modified, saves orders to file and closes view.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • cancel

        public void cancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Cancel button. Closes view.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • delete

        public void delete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Delete button. If user has selected an item in the table, displays a confirmation dialog and if accepted, deletes the selected item.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • importOrders

        public void importOrders(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Import button. Opens an Open File dialog and passes selected file path to FileXmlHandler to append file orders to currently loaded orders.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • exportOrders

        public void exportOrders(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method triggered when user presses Export button. Opens a Save File dialog and passes selected file path to FileXmlHandler to save current order list.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object passed during trigger.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method automatically called by JavaFX Application class when loading a view. Initialises the tableView of orders. Sets up filtered view for interactive searching on table columns. Also adds custom edit handlers to permit modifying order Status directly in table. Enables delete, import and export buttons if currentUser is a MANAGER.
